setCivilStatus

public boolean setCivilStatus(char status,
                              char newLastName)
Set a person's civil status

Parameters:
status - ('S'=Single;'M'=Married;'D'=Divorced;'W'=Widowed)
newLastName - new last name if person is female. Leave blank otherwise; This method shall return true if the status is changed. For example, an attempt to change status to married returns false if person is already married.
